docs.snippet: Roy Hibbert, ridiculed after going scoreless in Game 1, had a season-high 28 points with nine rebounds as the Pacers defeated the Wizards, 86-82, to even their series at 1-1....
docs.lead_paragraph: Roy Hibbert, ridiculed after going scoreless in Game 1, had a season-high 28 points with nine rebounds as the Pacers defeated the Wizards, 86-82, to even their series at 1-1.
docs.abstract: NBA Roundup; Indiana Pacers defeat Washington Wizards, 86-82, to tie their Eastern Conference semifinal series, 1-1; other basketball news noted.

docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column; some speculated in second half of regular NBA season that Brooklyn Nets were better off without injured center Brook Lopez, but Nets' conspicuous lack of a low-post presence was a key factor in playoff loss to Miami Heat.

headline.seo: Facing Heat, Nets Show They Miss Brook Lopez
